name: Debt-Bot (GDevelop Jam #1)
description:
You are D-Bot. A robot created by a young mechanic who asked for a loan bigger than anything he could pay. Determined to help your creator, you escape to a small village where you expect to get the 10k that he needs. 

Will you be able to BUILD up that small fortune?

Controls: (Don't worry if you can't remember anything above E, the rest will be shown at the moment you need them)

E: Use item

1-4: Pick Item

5-8: Make a choice / Pick an Item from Bag (Depends on context)

B: Open / Close Bag

M: Change Bag Mode

V: Waterwell Minigame
